description.plain:
Javarri Latre Walker (born June 13, 2000), popularly known as Hotboii, is an American recording artist from Orlando, Florida.

Hotboii first gained recognition with the release of the single “Don’t Need Time” and his 2020 debut mixtape, Kut Da Fan On. However, Hotboii gained a feature from Lil Baby for the release of the Don’t Need Time (Remix)” which gave Hotboii significant popularity and exposure, raising awareness for the original song and eventually gaining his first gold certified plaque.

On May 22, 2020, Hotboii released his debut studio album titled Kut Da Fan On gaining features from Pooh Shiesty, Toosii, and Lil Mosey. However, in May of 2021, Hotboii gained prominence after acquiring a joint single with Future titled “Nobody Special”.

body.plain:
Javarri Latre Walker (born June 13, 2000), popularly known as Hotboii, is an American recording artist from Orlando, Florida.

Hotboii first gained recognition with the release of the single “Don’t Need Time” and his 2020 debut mixtape, Kut Da Fan On. However, Hotboii gained a feature from Lil Baby for the release of the Don’t Need Time (Remix)” which gave Hotboii significant popularity and exposure, raising awareness for the original song and eventually gaining his first gold certified plaque.

On May 22, 2020, Hotboii released his debut studio album titled Kut Da Fan On gaining features from Pooh Shiesty, Toosii, and Lil Mosey. However, in May of 2021, Hotboii gained prominence after acquiring a joint single with Future titled “Nobody Special”.

songs.title: Don’t Need Time

description.plain:
“Don’t Need Time” is the lead single of Hotboii’s album Kut Da Fan On. The song gained popularity in June 2020 and has reached 65 million views on YouTube.

The song also gained a remix which featured Atlanta native rapper Lil Baby, and was released on August 25, 2020.

songs.full_title: Don't Need Time (Remix) by Hotboii (Ft. Lil Baby)
songs.title: Don’t Need Time (Remix)

description.plain:
“Don’t Need Time (Remix)” feature [Atlanta native rapper Lil Baby for the remixed version of Hotboii’s hit song “Don’t Need Time”.

In the song, Hotboii expresses the loss of his close friend and goes into depth of gun fights and trauma. He brings up the act of smoking in order to cope with the pain of his loss.

Lil Baby follows Hotboii’s vibe and talks about illegal activities such as robberies and drive by’s. He brings up his lows, however, describes never thinking about suicide. He also goes in depth on how he saw his close friend Lil Marlo die.

songs.embed_content: Read “Don't Need Time (Remix)” by Hotboii on Genius
